item.title: About
item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded: 88CREATE (part of the LoveGroup of companies) has a formidable and deserved reputation for helping corporations, advertising agencies and creative businesses to be brand consistent, improve the quality, rationalise the processes and manage the costs of their creative production requirements. And because we recognise that 'one size doesn’t fit all', 88CREATE is able to offer levels of service to match our client’s actual needs. What are yours?

item.title: Service
item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded:
You’ll appreciate the great service at 88CREATE

Our formidable reputation has been built on three pillars. Firstly, our proven abilities in producing creative production work of the very highest quality for corporates and agencies over the last 25 years. 88CREATE people Are the best of the best – knowledgeable, proficient, time sensitive and schedule driven > Our Work. Secondly, our track record in providing managed studio solutions backed by the very highest professional standards of creative production expertise and strong project management. Our Account Specialists are on hand to advise and manage your projects at every stage of the process Thirdly, our determination to be at the technological leading edge when it comes to producing, as well as managing workflow on behalf of our clients.

item.title: LOOP
item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded:
Introducing LOOP (Loveurope Online Operating Platform)

LOOP is the 88CREATE collaborative online management information system designed to keep clients, marketeers, project managers, account managers and operators up-to-date with project status – 24/7.
  • Control status, costs, purchases and budgets using tariff rate cards
  • Full campaign & project visibility and management driven by estimate approval
  • Campaign creation online with approvals & annotation
  • Full digital asset management with metadata & digital rights control
  • Version control & audit trail
  • Finance & reporting
  • Simple to adopt, easy to use, transparent
Find out more about LOOP

item.title: Cookie Blurb
item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded: This site uses cookies for analytics. Click here for T&Cs.

item.title: Terms & Conditions
item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded:
• Similar to other commercial websites, our Website uses a technology called "cookies" and web server logs to collect information about how our Website is used.

Cookies

A cookie is a very small text document, which often includes an anonymous unique identifier. When you visit a website, that site's computer asks your computer for permission to store this file in a part of your hard drive specifically designated for cookies. Information gathered through cookies and web server logs may include the date and time of visits, the pages viewed, time spent at our Website, and the websites visited just before and just after our Website. For further details on Cookies please visit www.allaboutcookies.org where you can find comprehensive information on Cookie restriction and blocking for a wide variety of browsers. How we use Cookies We use “analytical” cookies which, in conjunction with our web server's log files, allow us to calculate the aggregate number of people visiting our Website and which parts of the website are most popular. This helps us gather feedback so that we can improve our Website and better serve our users and members. We do not generally store any personal Information that you provided to us in your cookies. On some of our web pages third parties may also set their own cookies (for example when you click social media sharing buttons or view embedded videos hosted on another website). PPA cannot access the data stored in any such cookies (nor can such third parties access PPA’s cookies). By using our Website, you are deemed to consent to our use of the analytical cookies described above. You can refuse to accept cookies by activating the setting on your browser which allows you to refuse the setting of cookies (see below for further details). Please note that if you use your browser settings to block all cookies (including essential cookies) you may not be able to access all or parts of our site.

Our Cookies

Cookie Type Cookie Name Cookie Duaration Cookie Description
Analytics __utma Persistant (+ 2 years) These cookies are used to collect information about how visitors use our site. We use the information to compile reports and to help us improve the site. The cookies collect information in an anonymous form, including the number of visitors to the site, where visitors have come to the site from and the pages they visited.
__utmb Persistant (+ 1 Hour)
__utmc Session
__utmz Persistant (+6 Months)
__utmv 2 years from set/update
Functional cookie Persistant (+1 year) This cookie is used to remember whether a visitor to the site has previously accepted or declined cookies. No personal information is stored in this cookie)
legend Persistant (+1 year) This cookie is used to remember whether a visitor to the site has previously hidden the Skills page instructions. No personal information is stored in this cookie)

Refusing Cookies

You can refuse to accept all or some cookies by amending the settings on your web browser. For details about how to adjust your cookie settings in the following browsers, please visit the relevant link: Internet Explorer:
  • http://support.microsoft.com/kb/196955
  • http://support.microsoft.com/kb/283185
  • http://www.allaboutcookies.org/manage-cookies/internet-explorer7-plus.html
  • http://www.allaboutcookies.org/manage-cookies/internet-explorer8-plus.html
  • http://windows.microsoft.com/is-IS/windows7/How-to-manage-cookies-in-Internet-Explorer-9
Firefox
  • http://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/Cookies
Chrome
  • http://support.google.com/chrome/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer=95647

item.title: I’m looking to CHANGE my provider
item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded:
• 25 years of producing and managing creative production projects for some of the world’s most famous brands and biggest agencies
  • 100 experienced production experts and account specialists
  • £8 million of creative production services provided to global advertisers and their agencies across press, print, broadcast and digital channels each year
  • 30,000 print based adaptions, 10,000 online impressions and 150 hours of broadcast and digital content

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: When you need a creative production mate - 88CREATE

item.title: I’m looking for IN HOUSE creative production solutions
item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded:
• Outsource your creative production requirements as and when – high workload, time sensitive projects, to cover staff holidays or sickness
  • Access to a comprehensive range of additional specialist skills – including digital printing, retouching, CGI, video production and more
  • Account specialists are on hand to manage projects at every stage of the process
  • Benefit from LOOP, our online marketing management system – boosts productivity by streamlining approval processes

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Creative production as and when you need it most

item.title: I’m looking to OUTSOURCE creative production
item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded:
• Outsource your creative production requirements – and concentrate on your core business
  • Reduce staff costs associated with an internal studio - PAYE, NI, holiday & sick pay, downtime, floor-space and more
  • Avoid creative production technology costs - including keeping up-to-date with the latest production IT and any licenses
  • Maximise productivity - 88CREATE professionals are highly skilled, motivated, time and schedule conscious
  • Flexibility to scale up or scale down the resource to meet your requirements – including out of normal hours on request
  • Account specialists are on hand to manage projects at every stage of the process
  • Benefit from LOOP, our online marketing management system – keeps track of all outsourced projects 24/7

item.title: I’m looking to INCREASE productivity
item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded:
• Outsource your requirements to 88CREATE – the highly regarded, purpose-built creative production services company offering a comprehensive range of skills
  • Part or fully implant 88CREATE into your business – with the flexibility to scale-up resource as and when needed
  • 88CREATE people are the best of the best – knowledgeable, proficient, time sensitive and schedule driven
  • Benefit from LOOP, our online marketing management system – boosts productivity by streamlining approval processes

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Make a date with 88CREATE and find out more

item.title: I’m looking to STREAMLINE creative production processes
item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded:
• Benefit from LOOP, our online marketing management system – streamlines the workflow and touch points of one or many projects
  • Account specialists are on hand to manage projects at every stage of the process
  • Consolidate many suppliers into one specialist resource - and one point of contact

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Don’t leave it to fate, talk to 88CREATE

item.title: I’m looking to MANAGE creative production costs
item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded:
• Consolidate many suppliers into one specialist resource - and one point of contact
  • Reduce staff costs with a studio implant or fully outsourced 88CREATE solution - PAYE, NI, holiday & sick pay, downtime and more
  • Reduce creative production technology costs with 88CREATE – including the very latest kit and licenses
  • Benefit from LOOP, our online marketing management system – saves time by tracking every stage in the creative production process

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Make a date with 88CREATE and find out more

item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded: LoveDigital produce their largest ever global campaign for Philips – 3,000+ executions, 10 languages, 18 days!

item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded: Our overseas network goes from strength to strength with the launch of LoveJohannesburg

item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded: Appointed as J. P. Morgan’s fully integrated in-house creative production studio – still a valued client of 88CREATE

item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded: Loveurope create the multi-award winning Landmark Trojan Olympic Games viral campaign – at the time the fastest growing campaign of its kind with over 4.5million hits in the first month

item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded: Our eleven subsidiaries are restructured into Love Group. LoveWarsaw also opens its doors

item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded: We expand our European network to include Geneva, Zurich and Milan

item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded: With the launch of LovePrague we become the first independent creative production group to invest in the emerging markets

item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded: Acquisition of 64K – a leading UK based web agency, the foundations of LoveDigital. 64K goes on to win many awards and new clients

item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded: K9 take over McCann London’s studio – our first creative production joint venture

item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded: ‘Adzone’ becomes the first dedicated client studio with BMP London – created to service the British Gas retail advertising account

item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded: We set up McCann Communications internal creative production studio – the first of its kind for an integrated agency

item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded: Crafthouse produce their first work for L’Oreal Paris – still a valued client to this day

item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded: Crafthouse becomes the first studio in London to adopt the revolutionary new Apple Mac system and commercialise the platform for typography, design and production

item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded: Crafthouse typographics launches in London - a type-styling and design studio working with advertising agencies

item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded: Loveurope breaks through the £8million barrier producing press, print, broadcast and digital for UK and global advertisers

item.dc:creator: Sanj
item.content:encoded: The group acquire Asset Graphics and open LoveKiev to consolidate our position as the second largest creative production services group
